item.description:
Learn about and/or deepen your experience with the Pure Land teachings with Dr. Mark Unno. This is the best Shin Buddhist event of the year for the east coast of the USA. Open to beginner's to the most advanced. We recommend that you register early because the Barre Center fills up and enrollment is limted.

Visit the Barre Center for Buddhist Studies in Barre, Massachusetts for details and sign up. There will be no gathering in Middletown.


To learn more and register, visit our web site at www.bffct.net. This is not a Buddhist Faith Fellowship retreat but we highly recommend it to all friends and members. It can be a life changing experience.
item.how_to_find_us: Google the location in Barre, Mass. Please register first. See our web site's Calendar to connect with them.

group.name: Buddhist Faith Fellowship in Middletown, Ct

item.name: Buddhist Meetup Group - Shin Buddhist Weekend Retreat
